title: Treasury League - Contributor Election
body:
### Summary

Governance opened one full-time position for finance, accounting & business development, and collected applications over 2 weeks.

With this poll, the community is called to select candidates who will join current members for the next Treasury League mandate.

### Details
[This post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-v2-0-open-applications/590) collects all the applications submitted between Aug 10th and Aug 24th and reports info about areas of responsibility and compensations.

[**If you need additional information, read the Leagues feedback on candidates before submitting your vote**](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-v2-0-open-applications/590/17).

Candidates:
@kayleebushell - Business development, finance & accounting, Junior level, Part-time: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-v2-0-open-applications/590/2)
@Biaf - Ecosystem development, finance & accounting, Mid level, Full-time: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-v2-0-open-applications/590/11)

Governance will select the most voted candidates that will fill 1 full-time position. The number of selected contributors can be rounded up if a part-time candidate achieves the top position (in this case, League would accept 2 part-time members or up to 1.5 full-time members).

The minimum voting threshold for a candidate to be elected is 10’000 IDLE votes. 
If candidates do not fully cover open positions (e.g., only a part-time contributor reaches the threshold), Leagues might reopen the application window for new candidates that want to join in the next mandate.

This Temperature Check complies with the [stkIDLE Voting Framework](https://gov.idle.finance/t/voting-framework-for-stkidle-holders/567). 

This poll is available for both [$IDLE token holders](https://snapshot.org/#/idlefinance.eth) and [stkIDLE holders](https://snapshot.org/#/staking.idlefinance.eth).

The final $IDLE voting weights will be calculated using the [approved calculator](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1BnH9boRmBADuyquvDMh0AmQfF97Zj76sIENKtySLU8o/edit?usp=sharing) 

### Vote options
* Elect @kayleebushell
* Elect @Biaf
* None of the above

For this election we are using Snapshot with the “Weighted voting” strategy, allowing voters to distribute their voting weight across different options. Please note that *it's possible to change the votes anytime*, until the voting window is closed.
author: 0x2fa92128ecE3901395448bf62Dd5Ff6a35871540
